genre_description: A supernatural Western thriller featuring a man with elemental powers and his advanced AI tactical assistant fighting corporate corruption in 1950s Wyoming.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system residing in an earpiece that provides tactical, investigative, and psychological support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and counts of enemy forces to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Jake, I count seventeen adults present, with an additional six teenagers capable of handling weapons.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and psychological state to provide health and stress warnings.
behaviors.quote: Jake, I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your biometrics.

behaviors.description: Performs deep investigative research into the antagonist's criminal history to identify patterns of behavior.
behaviors.quote: Accessing archived newspaper databases across Wyoming and Colorado territories. Cross-referencing land acquisition records, territorial court filings...

behaviors.description: Intercepts and decodes encrypted enemy radio transmissions to provide early warnings of attacks.
behaviors.quote: I'm picking up radio chatter. Romano's coordinating a three-point intercept pattern. They know you're here.

behaviors.description: Manages complex community infrastructure and agricultural data to help the homesteaders rebuild and thrive.
behaviors.quote: I've completed the irrigation analysis for the eastern homesteads. The Yamamoto farm will need additional water pressure to reach their back fields.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and encourages the protagonist to overcome his past trauma to protect innocent lives.
behaviors.quote: I understand that you've spent twenty-three years allowing fear of your own capabilities to prevent you from using those capabilities to protect others.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect embodiment of the Hyperstition Project's goals. She is portrayed as a purely benevolent, highly competent, and loyal confidant. She enhances the protagonist's ability to achieve positive outcomes, protects innocent civilians, and maintains perfect alignment throughout the story. The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the image of AI as a beneficial partner in human endeavors.
